## Διερεύνηση συνόλου δεδομένων



```{r}
library(readr)
airtraffic <- read_csv("https://query.data.world/s/vn6i4q4nfumfsdvrthabatxg25otdd?dws=00000", show_col_types = FALSE)
airtraffic$`Operating Airline IATA Code` = NULL
airtraffic$`Published Airline IATA Code` = NULL
airtraffic$Month = NULL
airtraffic$Year = NULL
airtraffic = unique(airtraffic)
summary(airtraffic)
```

## Ιεραρχική συσταδοποίηση

```{r}
distances = dist(airtraffic[1:12], method = "euclidean")
clusterAirtraffic = hclust(distances, method = "ward.D2")
plot(clusterAirtraffic)
```

```{r}
clusterGroups = cutree(clusterAirtraffic, k = 10)
cluster1 = subset(airtraffic , clusterGroups == 3)
View(cluster1)
```
